projectElectus

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • projectElectus.Platform
      • projectElectus.Entity
        • projectElectus.Character
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Locatable

    public class Character
extends Entity
    This class creates and manages the player's character.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> inventory 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Character(int x, int y, int w, int h, int life, boolean fly, java.lang.String f, java.lang.String n) 
      Character(int x, int y, int w, int h, java.lang.String n)
      This constructor creates a character at a given location, with a specific given height and width, names the character object, and colors the character white.
      Character(int x, int y, int w, int h, java.lang.String f, java.lang.String n)
      This constructor creates a character at a given location, with a specific given height and width, names the character object, and colors the character white.

    • Field Detail

      • inventory

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> inventory

    • Constructor Detail

      • Character

        public Character(int x,
         int y,
         int w,
         int h,
         java.lang.String n)
        This constructor creates a character at a given location, with a specific given height and width, names the character object, and colors the character white. It also assigns the character health, damage, explosion, experience, and speed values.
        Parameters:
        x - - x-coordinate of the character
        y - - y-coordinate of the character
        w - - width of the character
        h - - height of the character
        n - - name of the character

      • Character

        public Character(int x,
         int y,
         int w,
         int h,
         java.lang.String f,
         java.lang.String n)
        This constructor creates a character at a given location, with a specific given height and width, names the character object, and colors the character white. It also assigns the character health, damage, explosion, experience, and speed values.
        Parameters:
        x - - x-coordinate of the character
        y - - coordinate of the character
        w - - width of the character
        h - - height of the character
        f - - name of the file where the character's sprite is stored
        n - - name of the character

      • right

        public boolean right()
        This method manages the animation of the Character moving right. Depending on the computer's time, the Character will have a different sprite.
        Returns:
        true if the animation cycle is still running

      • left

        public boolean left()
        This method manages the animation of the Character moving left. Depending on the computer's time, the Character will have a different sprite.
        Returns:
        true if the animation cycle is still running
